entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
